trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"> </xref> gli eventi del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando le funzionalità dell'insieme di controlli Web part, è possibile creare una connessione tra due <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o altri controlli server, con un controllo che funge da provider e l'altro che funge da consumer di dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una connessione, i due controlli devono risiedere in una zona da cui eredita il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe (ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>controllo), e devono essere progettate in modo corretto per condividere i dati tramite un'interfaccia comune.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulle connessioni Web part, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>e [Cenni preliminari sulle connessioni di Web part](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartConnectionsEventArgs i dati dell'evento passati ai metodi che utilizzano il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>delegato per gestire gli eventi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: Esistono due diversi metodi correlati alla connessione che generano eventi e utilizzano la classe WebPartConnectionsEventArgs per fornire dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi sono membri del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>metodo genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>evento dopo l'avvenuta connessione di due controlli server e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>metodo genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>evento dopo la disconnessione di due controlli server.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori possono creare eventi personalizzati per i metodi del gestore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>degli eventi, e in tali metodi, è possibile utilizzare la classe di WebPartConnectionsEventArgs per accedere ai dettagli di una connessione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, uno sviluppatore può dichiarare il `OnWebPartsConnected` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e assegnare un nome di metodo personalizzato che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Nel metodo del gestore personalizzato, gli sviluppatori possono accedere ai dettagli di una connessione tramite l'oggetto WebPartConnectionsEventArgs che viene passato come parametro al metodo.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ha due overload del costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>costruttore è il valore predefinito, inizializza i valori delle proprietà per la classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>costruttore chiama il costruttore predefinito e quindi inizializza anche la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ha diverse proprietà, che fanno tutte riferimento agli aspetti essenziali di una connessione Web part.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>proprietà fa riferimento all'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto che rappresenta l'intera connessione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>riferimenti a proprietà un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o un altro controllo server funge da provider nella connessione e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A>riferimenti a proprietà un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o controllo server che funge da consumer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>proprietà fa riferimento la connessione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>riferimenti alle proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> class without requiring a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"> </xref> classe senza un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il costruttore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Non richiede un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore inizializza i valori delle relative proprietà tramite l'assegnazione di ciascuno dei relativi oggetti parametro relativi alla connessione per la proprietà corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo che funge da provider.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: Il punto di connessione del provider.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo che funge da consumer.

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: Il punto di connessione consumer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: Questa versione del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore viene utilizzato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>l'oggetto è disponibile.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o controllo server che funge da provider.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o controllo server che funge da consumer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto della connessione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto contiene tutti i dettagli di una connessione Web part, inclusi i riferimenti al controllo provider, il punto di connessione del provider, il controllo utente e il punto di connessione consumer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulle connessioni Web part, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Cenni preliminari sulle connessioni di Web part](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo che funge da consumer nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una connessione tra i controlli in una zona Web part richiede un controllo di agire come il provider e un altro come il consumer.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Ogni controllo deve avere anche un punto di connessione definito. nel caso del consumer, il punto di connessione deve essere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulle connessioni Web part, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Cenni preliminari sulle connessioni di Web part](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> funge da consumer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> oggetto della connessione corrente.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una connessione tra i controlli in una zona Web part richiede un controllo di agire come il provider e un altro come il consumer.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Ogni controllo deve avere anche un punto di connessione definito. nel caso del consumer, il punto di connessione deve essere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulle connessioni Web part, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Cenni preliminari sulle connessioni di Web part](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> della connessione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo che funge da provider nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una connessione tra i controlli in una zona Web part richiede un controllo di agire come il provider e un altro come il consumer.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Ogni controllo deve avere anche un punto di connessione definito. nel caso del provider, il punto di connessione deve essere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulle connessioni Web part, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Cenni preliminari sulle connessioni di Web part](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> funge da provider.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> oggetto della connessione corrente.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Una connessione tra i controlli in una zona Web part richiede un controllo di agire come il provider e un altro come il consumer.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Ogni controllo deve avere anche un punto di connessione definito. nel caso del provider, il punto di connessione deve essere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulle connessioni Web part, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Cenni preliminari sulle connessioni di Web part](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> della connessione corrente.
